title: Remove some unnecessary type arguments.
body:
Remove some unnecessary type arguments.

This is another CL that comes courtesy of IntelliJ.

RELNOTES=n/a
author: copybara-service[bot]

files_changed.patch:
@@ -469,7 +469,7 @@ public static <E> int drainUninterruptibly(
    * of the deque's iterators:
    *
    * {@snippet :
-   * Deque<E> deque = Queues.synchronizedDeque(Queues.<E>newArrayDeque());
+   * Deque<E> deque = Queues.synchronizedDeque(Queues.newArrayDeque());
    * ...
    * deque.add(element);  // Needn't be in synchronized block
    * ...

@@ -467,7 +467,7 @@ public static <E> int drainUninterruptibly(
    * of the deque's iterators:
    *
    * {@snippet :
-   * Deque<E> deque = Queues.synchronizedDeque(Queues.<E>newArrayDeque());
+   * Deque<E> deque = Queues.synchronizedDeque(Queues.newArrayDeque());
    * ...
    * deque.add(element);  // Needn't be in synchronized block
    * ...
